page.title: 02Employment in Carlton
page.content: Interviews conducted with Carlton children on their parents source of emloyment went as follows:_ Mr X moved to Carlton from Birmingham with his family.He moved originally to work at Eggborough but is now working on the Drax 2 Project as an engineer. Mr Y,a farmer,has lived in Carlton all his life,as his father did before him.He is also a coal merchant and his coal truck delivers in the Selby/Goole area.He owns 8O acres and rents 65 acres. He employs 4 people. Mr Z moved with his family to Carlton from Pontefract to work as a manual unit operator at Eggborough Power Station. These interviews seem typical of Carlton in that some people have lived and worked all their lives in Carlton in traditional industries while others have moved to work in modern industry.
